meanings.definition: To inhale and exhale the smoke of burning tobacco or a drug.
meanings.sent2: She always smoked a pipe after dinner.
meanings.sent3: The detective smoked out the suspect from his hiding place.
meanings.sent4: The campfire smoked lazily in the evening breeze.
meanings.sent5: The factory chimney smoked heavily, polluting the air.
meanings.sent6: After a long day, he finally smoked his favorite cigar.
meanings.sent7: The old man smoked his pipe while reading the newspaper.
meanings.sent8: The barbecue smoked deliciously as the meat cooked slowly.
meanings.sent9: The car's engine smoked after running for hours without a break.
meanings.sent10: The volcano smoked ominously before erupting.

meanings.definition: To preserve (food) by exposure to smoke.
meanings.sent1: They smoked the fish to keep it fresh.
meanings.sent2: The villagers smoked the meat to store it for winter.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally smoked the cheese too long, giving it a strong flavor.
meanings.sent4: The smokehouse smoked the ham perfectly for a savory taste.
meanings.sent5: The hunter smoked the jerky to enjoy on his hunting trip.
meanings.sent6: The family smoked the sausages for a barbecue party.
meanings.sent7: The butcher smoked the bacon to enhance its flavor.
meanings.sent8: The restaurant smoked the salmon for a unique dish.
meanings.sent9: The farmer smoked the hams for the upcoming festival.
meanings.sent10: The chef smoked the duck breast for a gourmet meal.

meanings.definition: Having been treated in this way.
meanings.sent1: The smoked salmon was a hit at the party.
meanings.sent2: She loved the smoked cheese on her sandwich.
meanings.sent3: The smoked ham had a rich flavor.
meanings.sent4: The smoked meat was a specialty of the region.
meanings.sent5: The smoked fish was a delicacy in the coastal town.
meanings.sent6: The smoked sausage was a favorite at the barbecue.
meanings.sent7: The smoked turkey was the centerpiece of the Thanksgiving feast.
meanings.sent8: The smoked bacon added a delicious touch to the salad.
meanings.sent9: The smoked tofu surprised the vegetarian guests.
meanings.sent10: The smoked almonds were a crunchy snack at the picnic.
